DOC.brief_summary: To asses clinical effectiveness blend cognitive behavior therapy ( CBT ) : face-to-face internet-based treatment adult Major Depressive Disorder ( MDD ) primary care compare treatment usual .
DOC.brief_title: Blended Depression Therapy : Cognitive Behaviour Therapy Face-to-face Via Internet
DOC.detailed_description: The study part EU-project . Participants recruit via regular route primary care setting . Following Mini International Neuropsychiatric Interview ( M.I.N.I . ) participant randomly allocate either blend treatment 10 sessions/weeks treatment usual . We include 150 participant total .
DOC.criteria: depressive symptom accord DSMIV access computer internet connection good knowledge Swedish language recent ( last 6 week ) change psychiatric medication presently psychological treatment severe depression suicidal ideation
